title: Control
treatment_protocol_ch1: Blood samples from five mild  Hand,foot and mouth disease and five extremely severe Hand,foot and mouth disease children according to the ‘hand,foot and mouth disease prevention control guide’(2008 Edition) issued by the Ministry of Health, China(http://www.moh.gov.cn/publicfiles/business/htmlfiles/mohbgt/s9511/200805/34775.htm), were randomly collected for experiments and clinical symptoms and laboratory test(EV71 nucleic acid detection kit) confirmed that the EV71infections caused all these hand,foot and mouth disease cases. In addition to meeting the above symptoms, extremely severe Hand,foot and mouth disease patients all had encephalitis, pulmonary hemorrhage, and mechanical ventilation and other clinical symptoms.They were proven to have no other disease after a systematic check in the hospital.Five blood samples from healthy children were collected as controls
extract_protocol_ch1: We isolated exosomes of sera from all participants by using ExoQuick precipitation following manufacturer′s instructions, Total RNA extracted using Trizol following manufacturer′s instructions
label_protocol_ch1: 100 ng of total RNA(including miRNA) were dephosphorylated and denaturated,then ligated with Cyanine 3-pCp at 16℃ for 2 hours using T4 RNA Ligase.
hyb_protocol: Oligoarray control targets and hybridization buffer (Agilent miRNA Spike- In kit and miRNA Hybridization Kit) were added, and samples were applied to microarrays enclosed in Agilent SureHyb-enabled
scan_protocol: Scanned on an Agilent G2505C scanner.
description: miRNA expression after 6hr in 0Gy-irradiated human blood
data_processing: Images were quantified using Agilent Feature Extraction Software (version 10.7.1.1).
data_processing.1: Agilent Feature Extraction Software (version 10.7.1.1) was used for background subtraction and quantile normalization.
